data.title: Siim Kallas - a Freedom of Information request to Secretariat General of the European Commission
data.meta_description:
Yours faithfully,

Vicky Cann
CEO
Rue d'Edimbourg 26
1050 Brx
data.text:
Dear Secretariat General,

Under the right of access to documents in the EU treaties, as developed in Regulation 1049/2001, I am requesting copies of all applications by Siim Kallas which seek Commission authorisation for new professional activities under the commissioner code of conduct. I would further like to request any emails, correspondence and meeting notes which relate to these applications; all opinions from the ad hoc ethical committee on each case; and copies of the Commission's final decision in each case.

Yours faithfully,

Vicky Cann

CEO

Rue d'Edimbourg 26

1050 Brx

Dear Madam,

Thank you for your email dated 24/02/2015.

We hereby acknowledge receipt of your application for access to documents, which was registered on 25/02/2015 under reference number GestDem 2015/1147.

In accordance with Regulation (EC) No 1049/2001 regarding public access to European Parliament, Council and Commission documents, your application will be handled within 15 working days.

The time limit will expire on 18/03/2015. In case this time limit needs to be extended, you will be informed in due course.

Yours faithfully,

Carlos Remis

SG.B.4

Transparence

Berl. 05/332

show quoted sections

Veuillez trouver ci-joint le document Ares(2015)1410546 concernant "RE/ GestDem 2015/1147" envoyé par M/Mme KLINGBEIL Marianne le 31/03/2015.

Please find attached document Ares(2015)1410546 regarding "RE/ GestDem 2015/1147" sent by Mr/Ms KLINGBEIL Marianne on 31/03/2015.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: This e-mail was automatically generated by the European Commission's central mail registration system.

Replies by e-mail must be addressed to the original sender KLINGBEIL Marianne (mailto:[email address]).

Remarque : Cet e-mail a été généré automatiquement par le système d'enregistrement central du courrier de la Commission européenne.

Toute réponse éventuelle par e-mail doit être adressée à l'expéditeur en personne, à savoir KLINGBEIL Marianne (mailto:[email address]).
